attributes.action: Ensure clear labelling on donated blood.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure clear labelling of donated blood is labelled to say whether it is from a donor who has had the covid 19 vaccination or not.
attributes.background: To ensure donated blood, used for transfusions etc, is clearly labelled to say whether it is from a donor who has had the covid 19 vaccination or not.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions on safety and blood donation are made based on the advice of the Advisory Committee on the Safety of Blood, Tissues and Organs.
